titles.title: To amend the Harmonized Tariff Schedule of the United States to correct the definition of certain hand-woven wool fabrics.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Ways and Means.

bill.summary: 4/10/2002--Introduced. Amends the Harmonized Tariff Schedule of the United States to revise the definition of certain hand-woven wool fabrics, and apply to them specified staged rate reductions.
